meta.description: I built and scaled a 30-person design org at SunTrust across all lines of business, then led business and commercial banking design through the $66B merger to Truist.

hero.label: Truist Financial
hero.title: Defining the Digital Experience for America's 7th Largest Bank
hero.subtitle: I built and scaled a 30-person design organization at SunTrust — owning every line of business — then led business and commercial banking design through the largest bank merger since 2008.

context.challenge: Scaling a design practice ahead of a $66B merger.
context.scope: All lines of business (SunTrust); Business & Commercial Banking (Truist); Design System
context.body: I inherited a nascent UX team at SunTrust with no research function and no independent design voice. I scaled it to a 30-person design organization covering Consumer, Small Business, Wealth Management, and Commercial Banking. When the $66B merger with BB&T created Truist, I led the UX methodology and design execution for business and commercial banking across the newly merged entity.

sections.label: The Ecosystem
sections.title: Architecting experience at scale.
sections.description: I led UX design and research across the entirety of SunTrust's digital footprint. Managing at this scale required establishing an evidence-based design methodology and successfully integrating the voice of the customer into the Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe).

cards.title: Consumer Mobile
cards.description: Account management, transfers, and day-to-day banking designed for speed and clarity.

cards.title: Business Banking
cards.description: Multi-account management, notifications, and commercial tools for business clients.

cards.title: Web Platform
cards.description: Full-featured dashboard with spending analytics, account activity, and cross-product visibility.

sections.label: Post-Merger Integration
sections.title: Translating brand into a universal design system.
sections.description: Following the merger, I directed the creative team responsible for translating the new Truist brand into comprehensive visual design and UI standards. The brand's digital palette was heavily constrained, dominated by Truist Purple — the signature hue born from BB&T burgundy and SunTrust blue — which made establishing sufficient contrast, hierarchy, and range across UI states a real design challenge. We defined the Truist design system and UI standards across all digital products for the newly merged entity.

cards.title: Systems Architecture
cards.description: Oversaw the structural integration of two legacy banking systems into a unified UI pattern library.

cards.title: Cross-Platform Scale
cards.description: Managed strategy for responsive deployment across mobile, web, and internal banking portals.

cards.title: Methodology Integration
cards.description: Embedded dedicated research and design roles into SAFe agile pods.

cards.title: Enterprise Standards
cards.description: Established the governance models for the Truist design system.

sections.label: Commercial & Wealth
sections.title: Strategic Business Lines.
sections.description: I exclusively led the UX domain for Small Business and Commercial Banking through the Truist transition, directing teams to design the tools that manage high-value portfolios and enterprise operational capital.
